Reviews.Content: I love it , fast and easy can do anything on the kindle it's the best.I do not leave the house with out it. I hate to say this but I had a nook and the kindle  is a better and improve item .  I also love the apps that you can download it's the greatest .You can not beat the price go for it you will love it.!!!!!!
Reviews.Title: I love my new kindle

Reviews.Author: Melani J Baysinger
Reviews.Content: My daughter has a Kindle Fire and the batter lasts a whole lot longer than my new Kindle Fire HDX.  I'm a little disappointed with that feature.  Other than that I am still trying to learn how to navigate around on it.  This is my first tablet and I am happy with what it does for now.
Reviews.Title: Battery life is shorter than I expected it to be.

Reviews.Author: JAM
Reviews.Content: Love the Kindle.  I love the calendar, contact list, and books I can download.  The only problem is this particular Kindle cannot be read outside due to the glare...no screen is going to fix that.  So I guess I'll be reading my books inside or get an e-ink reader (cheaper kindle).  Wish there was also a storage device slot to access.
Reviews.Title: Great Device

Reviews.Author: Courtney
Reviews.Content: I think this tablet is super nice! It's so sleek and so light to hold in your hands. I've had it for almost a month and I'm still so happy with it. The display is amazing and reading books is so nice with this tablet. If you shop on amazon all the time like I do, then you'll definitely love it!
Reviews.Title: nice!

Reviews.Author: aida m. sniegowski
Reviews.Content: This Kindle is just the right size to fit in my purse to take with me. It is easy to use and there are a lot of apps you can get.It is great for people who read and for those who want to play games, check on gas prices, email, weather.
Reviews.Title: Just the right size

Reviews.Author: Albert M. Carter
Reviews.Content: Hi quality display for video streaming which works great until more than six or seven devices are on the network. When the kids show up with their iphones and laptops the kindle drops its connection every 15 minutes when the WPA-2 group handshake occurs. I can have as many other devices connected as I want, but the kindle will not stay connected when more than six or seven other devices connect. I keep my ipod, ipad, roku, and other devices off the network and the kindle works fine. I've had a service ticket open for months - wonder if they will ever have a fix?
Reviews.Title: Wireless connection problem still unresolved

Reviews.Author: bjarne martesen
Reviews.Content: USB cable did not work for charging. Other than that the device is fine. Buying forigen languish books from europe works well.
Reviews.Title: USB cable

Reviews.Author: Biggi
Reviews.Content: Saved my money, bought my daughter an HD and myself and HDX for Christmas.Hers is still working though he volume is much quieter then that of the HDX version.Though I am not one to use a tablet for hours, I found it really easy to move around. I am sure there are still areas I have not explored yet nor know what to do. It will take some time to learn. Kindle is really a ease way to move around and learn.I owned a Nexxxus tablet before, gave it to my husband. It felt less personal.Kindle and connection with Amazon.com. I feel connected and great support.Sadly within 4 weeks my Kindle HDX just quit . Didn't turn on anymore. Amazon.com Kindle support was very helpful.Via phone they tried to boost it or whatever they did. But it did not work. So we agreed that I needed to ship it back.Here is where it becomes a bit odd.I told them I do not want a refurbished one. I paid for a new one and would like to have a new one.Though the agent agreed with me and assured me, when the replacement arrived, it said right on the box, refurbished one.Wow. But Amazon.com always is willing to work things out. Unfortunately in this case, the only thing that was left to do was to return the broken one, the replacement one and now order a brand new one.Apparently they are not sending out new ones to replace one.I will keep an eye on the sales. Hopefully I can purchase one soon.Love the HDX, love the service via amazon.com, but don't get that I can't get a new one as a replacement since I paid for a new one and it was only 4 weeks later that I had a problem.
Reviews.Title: didn't work for long

Reviews.Author: Renee L Browell
Reviews.Content: I can do just about everything on this and I absolutely love it. Also it is light weight and very nice to read on,play games,watch movies,check e-mails, etc.
Reviews.Title: love it

Reviews.Author: KB's
Reviews.Content: Bought it for the wife and what an awesome tablet. Picture is clear, color is great. Can't keep her off it. What a great product.
Reviews.Title: Awesome!!

Reviews.Author: Richard
Reviews.Content: I have owned mine for about half a year now. Each day it is the first device I reach for. I read and write email, surf the web, read and listen to books and watch videos. It has replaced my iPads almost entirely. I recommend it unreservedly.
Reviews.Title: Fantastic tablet

Reviews.Author: Lynn Timko
Reviews.Content: Wonderful Kindle I got Primetime with it. Which really makes it fun. I keep my kindle close by at all times.
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 7", HDX Display, Wi-Fi, 16 GB

Reviews.Author: Michael E. Jennnings
Reviews.Content: Just received Kindle Fire, still getting to know it.  I love that I can read my Kindle books and search the web from one device.
Reviews.Title: Love it

Reviews.Author: Kathy L. Scholl "Katlyn100"
Reviews.Content: I've bought 6 Kindles, starting with the very first generation -- I have three Kindle Fires and love this one the best.  I got a 32GB this time because I ran out of app space on my 16GB.  I also got one for my granddaughter.  This model boots up faster than the others and is so light, even when in a case, that I hardly notice it's in my purse.  I couldn't live without it!
Reviews.Title: Love It!

Reviews.Author: Woodsman
Reviews.Content: Bought two and pleased with them.  Wife and granddaughter each have one and they absolutely love them.  Bought without annoying popups or ads.
Reviews.Title: Good purchase

Reviews.Author: Sandra Hatcher
Reviews.Content: This is my first e-reader/tablet.  I've found the Fire HDX to be very easy to understand and use.  I ordered the 32 gb so I could load my music and book library and still have room for apps and movies.  Even with everything loaded, I still have a lot of room and the speed is still incredibly fast.  I've used the Mayday button a few times and have had excellent help from the CSRs that have answered.  Overall, I'm really happy with my purchase and would recommend this tablet to friends and family.
Reviews.Title: Great product

Reviews.Author: Ben
Reviews.Content: Amazing access to Amazon products, simple user interface and a great battery life. I love this thing to the end of the earth and back.
Reviews.Title: Don't know how I lived before Kindle

Reviews.Author: linda murchison
Reviews.Content: fabulous  and my friend purchased after she saw mine and she too is thrilled, i am  getting one for my mom
Reviews.Title: it is a wonderful and easy to use kindle

Reviews.Author: David D. Shealor
Reviews.Content: I bought the original kindle and after a year or so it disappeared. I took that as an excuse to get the Kindle HD which was a large improvement. I read quite a few books and became ever so slightly addicted to a solitaire game. Eventually, I used that Kindle more than my PC. Then I got it into my head that I needed a 10.4 inch screen so I got one and after a day I was asking myself "why did I think this would be so great?" It was too big.So I returned it and got the 8.9 inch HDX for less than half the price. I really like this kindle. It is lighter than the HD and much faster to browse the internet. I suppose if you wanted to watch video on a tablet there would be reason to have a bigger screen but to read books and check bank balances etc the 8.9 inch HDX is perfect.
Reviews.Title: 3rd Kindle

Reviews.Author: Sean Derek Brown
Reviews.Content: Great screen, easy to read, easy to use. It does exactly what I want the way that it want it to.
Reviews.Title: Love it

Reviews.Author: Sandra Pritt "bzygrl44"
Reviews.Content: Great reader.  Much improved back light, very easy to navigate between apps.  Love the added bonus of being able to read/ and listen to audible simultaneously.
Reviews.Title: Great reader !!`

Reviews.Author: Rachel Groe
Reviews.Content: I bought this back in December (almost three months ago now) and have loved using it since! It works wonderfully, and my family loves using it to surf the web and play on applications (especially Netflix!). It is a very fast machine. I only wish it had a rear-camera for taking pictures, and a good Office-like app.
Reviews.Title: Great tablet!

Reviews.Author: Lin
Reviews.Content: Really like the HDX.  Had originally ordered the paperwhite but returned it.  Found it much harder to use.  I read a lot.  Had the HD for three years but wore it out.  Love not having to bother with books.
Reviews.Title: Kindle HDX

Reviews.Author: LOURDES REROMA
Reviews.Content: This device is so handy.  Except for the front facing camera, this gadget is great.  I would have wanted a camera that could switch to the back.
Reviews.Title: excellent

Reviews.Author: S. J. Mattox "suzi"
Reviews.Content: Love the Kindle Fire HDX! This is my first Kindle, also my first tablet. I couldn't be happier with my purchase. Glad I got the 7"; it's perfect in hand and perfectly portable. I am a graduate student who also works full time as an informatics professional. This tablet has made my life so much easier...highly recommend it. Bought the same for a family member, but the HD model instead. The HD is also great, and an amazing bargain. I appreciate the speed, the better picture and the camera included in the HDX...but the HD will suit you fine if you don't mind scaling back a bit. All in all, I am a very happy customer.
Reviews.Title: Far Exceeds Expectations

Reviews.Author: Energybunny
Reviews.Content: I would like an instruction book for  my kindle so I would know how touse everything on it.  Especially taking pictures and videos. I am new at this and it would help to have a book.
Reviews.Title: Instructionbook for my kindle

Reviews.Author: Ldill76
Reviews.Content: I cannot take away any stars even though the first one froze up on us within 3 days requiring restarts. Amazon was so on the ball I had the new one a day later, no issues since. The speed is awesome and for what my daughter and wife use it for this is by far the best investment we have made. The "FreeTime" section is worth three times the amount it is (3$ a month) keeping my daughter in a safe fun zone during her play time was paramount in my purchase decision. This is fast, fun and intuitive.
Reviews.Title: Haven't touched the ipad since.

Reviews.Author: Polly Johnson
Reviews.Content: So easy to learn how to operate.stays charged long time, and easy to see screen when reading with being able to c h cage screen col o r.
Reviews.Title: why i like my kindle fire

Reviews.Author: Lode
Reviews.Content: So the hardware i okay, but the FireOS is reall horrible.If you are 80 years old and have no experience with technology,this would be an amazing buy.Else, change the damn rom.
Reviews.Title: FireOS is horrible

Reviews.Author: Wayne Kuphal
Reviews.Content: I love it!! a review has to be longer than that. I read books on mine. You swipe to turn pages. you can highlight in multiple colors paragraphs, multiple lines, or single words you want. if you decide you no longer want the highlights. you can erase them. you cannot do that with a paper book (hard or soft cover).
Reviews.Title: My first Kindle

Reviews.Author: Tiffany
Reviews.Content: This was my Valentine's Day gift, I love it..  I have always wanted one and now that I have one I want to use it all the time.  I am still learning how to use mine but its fun to learn on!!
Reviews.Title: love it!!

Reviews.Author: happy mom
Reviews.Content: I have never had a tablet device before. I received a Kindle Fire HDX for Christmas and I love it. It is perfect to use on day trips with my 2 year old and it is so user friendly. I can use the free-time app and let my little one listen to all his books and play his games. Only once have I had a problem and I used the mayday app and a very nice and friendly lady looked into the problem and is working on fixing it for me. This is a great system.
Reviews.Title: Amazing

Reviews.Author: RoelV
Reviews.Content: Bought the Kindle for daily use, living in Holland. Both Enterprise (mail, social media and calendar) and private use. It's a great device. I was worried about the Appstore, but I shouldn't have been. Most apps were in the Amazon Appstore.Downloaded my Dutch apps (newspaper, tv live streaming app, ..) and my favorite apps (Netflix, Chromecast, Youtube) from the Playstore and copied them to my Kindle. Everything worked like a charm.All enterprise apps I needed for mobile device management were in the Amazon Appstore. Up and running within minutes.I do like my I-pad however the Kindle is more value for money.
Reviews.Title: Great value for money

Reviews.Author: Penny smith
Reviews.Content: My husband and I have iPads and wanted to get a tablet for our 8yr old son. We tried a kids tablet, but it had a lt of problems. We got him a kindle and it works great! We have also had a great experience with customer service... The first one we bought had a charging issue after a week or so and amazon sent us a brand new one without any problems! Would highly recommend the kindle fire hdx to anyone young or old! We may even replace our iPads for a kindle! The picture quality is awesome and it is very speedy!
Reviews.Title: Our kindle experience!!

Reviews.Author: drunkfurball
Reviews.Content: I saw this when it first released, and thought, "You know, I wouldn't mind one of those." So I bought four. What? I give amazing Christmas presents.So, they arrive, and I distribute them to the folks I bought them for. The rest of the day is kind of a blur. I vaguely remember eating food at some point. Funny thing is, my friends don't remember much else from that day either. You might think we had been the victims of some sort of alien abduction or something, but the reason was simpler than that. We were mesmerized by the clarity of the Kindle HDX display. No kidding. We spent so much time that day just staring at our new Kindle Fires that we don't remember much else from that day.Other than that, they are fast, easy to use, and connect to all the Amazon services you know and love. Just be sure you take the rest of the day off, and don't operate heavy machinery for at least 24 hours after yours arrives.
Reviews.Title: Hello, Gorgeous!

Reviews.Author: Tuesday Girl "Romance Fanatic"
Reviews.Content: I have had a Nook for a long time.  I actually wore out one and was on my second.  I was getting tired of the crappy power cords and the book prices.  So I jumped ship for a Kindle Fire with the 7"  HDX display.  I have never been happier!  It is easy to use, has a fantastic display screen and recharges quickly.  I read A LOT.  And I am more than thrilled with the variety and the cost of the books available.  I also use my Kindle for email, facebook, pintrest, among other things.  It is great, quick to load, easy to navigate and has crisp type that is easy to read.  I will never go back.  I downloaded the Nook app and now have my whole library available on a more reliable device.  And I find Amazon has more sales on their Kindle books than I ever got with B&N.;  Plus a new power cord won't cost me an arm and a leg!  I definately recommend the Kindle Fire!
Reviews.Title: Fantastic!

Reviews.Author: Pat
Reviews.Content: I have been an avid laptop user. At school, I was given an iPad to use, so I was use to Apple's. Several family members have Kindles, so I was familiar with the product. Last year, as a birthday gift for my husband, I gave him a 8.9 Kindle Fire HDX. He has enjoyed it and I found myself using it. So when it came time to get my own tablet, I chose a Kindle Fire HDX. I got the 7",  because the smaller size easily slips it into my purse. It goes nearly everywhere with me: Webmail, Facebook, reading a book or periodical, surfing the net or playing games. I love it and find I am using my laptop less and less. What a great and affordable tablet.
Reviews.Title: Loving my Kindle!

Reviews.Author: siwiak
Reviews.Content: I love the click for help button, it was a life saver when I set this up for my son! He's been busy for hours with it.
Reviews.Title: Help Button

Reviews.Author: Roberta
Reviews.Content: Love it, my son uses this for home and office, there could never be anything else he wanted for Christmas, thank you Amazon
Reviews.Title: Christmas Gift

Reviews.Author: ALFRED J.
Reviews.Content: Good Investment for now and the future.  Expect to be used every day.  Was actually a present, and was well received.
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 7":  A great present for a great experience

Reviews.Author: Donna Raymond
Reviews.Content: recieved this for xmas.  It was so easy to use and love the apps and all the reading materal that you are able to get. its easy to buy items on it thru amazon. my grandaughter has one and also my daughter in law.  We are a Kindle family
Reviews.Title: my kindle

Reviews.Author: Sydney Clough
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle Fire.  It is so great for traveling as it is so light.  I purchased a cover for it that allows me to read hands-free.  The color is amazing after using the original Kindle for a number of years.  And it is so much more portable than my old iPad.  This was a great gift from my kids.
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX7

Reviews.Author: Annetta
Reviews.Content: My boys enjoy the kindle and enjoy using it.  Having a hard time getting them to put it away so that they can get other things done.  Thank you!
Reviews.Title: Love it

Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: it is fun and better than the original kindle l love it so much. I think it is a great gift to give to someone
Reviews.Title: kindle fire

Reviews.Author: Candace Kirchner
Reviews.Content: Great  apps, super clear image,  sound loud enough, extremely user-friendly. Best gift for years. I hear it was very affordable.
Reviews.Title: Love this gift

Reviews.Author: RADIOCITY
Reviews.Content: I would tend to give it 4 & 1/2 stars, but there's no half star.  First, it IS a fantastic device.  Incredibly versatile, lightweight, with an amazing screen.  I have always had (it's probably me) trouble using Apple products, as for me, they simply aren't as intuitive as others, and I don't like I-Tunes, so the HDX was a logical choice.  It is very reasonable in cost, and for those who need it, the Mayday feature is sure to be a big hit.  I've used it two times, (could have easily found the answer to my question myself, but wanted to give it a try) and the help Amazon gives IS all it's cracked up to be.  Very convenient. This device is super fast, and dependable.  I won't carry a cell phone, but with this, you can load on a free app from MagicJack, and you're good to go!  Free phone calls are always great, right?  So, why not five stars? As with most tablets, there are the occasional hang-ups while online, mostly while trying to view a video, say from Yahoo.  Can be frustrating if you're not ready to just let it go.....just don't need to see it that badly.  It can lock up the device.  Some videos DO work, but not all. Not a biggie though, just disconnect, get back on, and move on.  Hey, this can happen on my laptop, and who amongst us hasn't experienced that?  This aside, this thing is so easy to use, if you can work your laptop, or desktop, you won't have to learn a thing......no jumping through hoops like I-Tunes to load music......just drag and drop it from your laptop, and voila! Very intuitive. I bought, and suggest the 32gig model, just to be certain you'll have plenty of memory, as you cannot upgrade the memory.  The sound from the built in speakers is nothing short of amazing, and of course through the headphone jack as well.  Maybe I should have given it FIVE stars.  One last thing......I almost was set to pay for the 'NO OFFERS' (which you can also do at a later time if you don't do it when you first buy the Kindle) but was glad I didn't. The offers are GREAT, the screens shots are brilliant, and you find yourself looking forward to them when you power up. In addition, a simple millisecond swipe of your finger, and they're gone, and you're ready to go.  You won't be disappointed.
Reviews.Title: Like most, I LOVE my Kindle.

Reviews.Author: Paula forney
Reviews.Content: I  love  it  I have  had  three  eye  surgerys  the  kindle  help  me  do  what  i  love  is  to  read  I  can  blow  up  the  font  and  i  see  the  books  much  better  thank  you
Reviews.Title: free urban fictiin

Reviews.Author: David W. Schreiber
Reviews.Content: This is our fourth Kindle and the best one yet! We could not be happier. Works perfectly. If you are looking for a tablet/e-reader think seriously about this Kindle.
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 7

Reviews.Author: RodLefty
Reviews.Content: Wanted to try a platform other than iOS. Chose Kindle over straight Android device. No problem with the limitations like Google Play. Can work around that. Really like the quick access to buying things on Amazon. I'm sure they like that too. But the touch sensitivity doesn't seem as clean as our iPads -- various generations and sizes. Silk doesn't always seem as fast as advertised. Also I like to close apps when not using them and that's not nearly as straightforward as the iPad approach. Battery life doesn't seem to be what I'd expected, but am trying to learn how to manage that. Finally, transferring things from iPad or iMac Pro to the Kindle is a snap. That's nice.
Reviews.Title: Good, but still not an iPad

Reviews.Author: K. Rowand
Reviews.Content: Love it!  Had considered a paper white, which is also very nice but the fire fills my needs much better.
Reviews.Title: kindle fire hdx

Reviews.Author: Lauren Doffont
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love my kindle fire hdx! It does everything I want, easily and efficiently. Portable, lightweight and beautiful! Best Christmas gift I got this year. Highly recommend
Reviews.Title: I love my kindle fire hdx

Reviews.Author: Linda W. Howard "LinderBeth"
Reviews.Content: The only reason I did not give my Kindle HDX 5 stars is because the battery life is so short.  Otherwise, I love the size, weight, and performance.
Reviews.Title: Love my HDX!

Reviews.Author: Eyesinthesky
Reviews.Content: I was disappointed at the number of times the unit hangs up.  We've had it several months not and at least every several weeks it hangs up play the simplest of app games to the point it must be shut down completely and re-booted.  The picture is good and I think I got a good deal on it buying it on cyber Monday but I can't highly recommend it to a friend.
Reviews.Title: Not a stellar performer

Reviews.Author: Patricia
Reviews.Content: I use the test-to-voice feature on the Kindle Fire HDX to listen to books, articles from the internet that I send to the Kindle, and read important business document aloud. The new audio voices on the Kindle HDX ( and there are many voices to choose from) are excellent, with a very realistic sound. The Kindle's text-to-voice is much easier to use than the iphone or ipad, and thevoice quality of the Kindle is better. I also use the Kindle to download instructional videos available on uTube, using one of the convenient uTube APPs. My favorite place to play my Kindle is at the gym, while on the treadmill or elliptical machine with a Bose noise-reducing headset - my workout times have increased due to the Kindle.
Reviews.Title: Great product at a great price!

Reviews.Author: Jan
Reviews.Content: 10 stars for Amazon customer service. I love everything about my kindle fir HDX. I was devastated when the sound went out and had to call because the MayDay button does not work without sound. I was connected almost immediately with RB and after the re boot failed I was approved on the spot for a replacement Kindle.This all took less than half an hour. The very next day I got an email saying my new Kindle was on the way and another with clear detailed instructions and labels to make the return easy. This was the best customer service experience ever.  I will be a Kindle customer for life !
Reviews.Title: 5 Stars for Customer Service

Reviews.Author: Andrew Vittoria
Reviews.Content: I have had the Fire for about a month and love it. It's easy to use, has tons of apps and books that arevery reasonably priced. The screen resolution is perfect. All that and under $175. What's not to love?
Reviews.Title: Great small tablet

Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: I started with a Kindle Fire and loved it for reading new or revisiting books I hadn't read in some time.  The new Kindle Fire HDX is a great advancement over the original.  Portability, ease of use, can go from reading a book to surfing the web or watching a Netflix video seamlessly. The Silk browser is a huge leap forward from the Kindle Fire and is very fast and responsive. The only con I have found so far is in the native e-mail application.  It works extremely well but it does not have a "select all" option when you need to move or delete e-mail, you have to select each one individually.  This is a minor quibble but would make the mail app shine (yes I know I have other options).  Now if I could just convince my significant other that the HDX 8.9" would be even better (or the 10" when it becomes available...)
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 7" for Christmas

Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "lilimarlene9"
Reviews.Content: I can do anything I want on it. I only wish I had spent the extra money & gotten the 3G option also.
Reviews.Title: love it!

Reviews.Author: robert carter
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my daughter as a Christmas present.... To date this has been the best gift she's ever had... Her words... The help feature is awesome! Live person interaction on your screen is truly awesome... I strongly recommend this product
Reviews.Title: Best Gift Ever

Reviews.Author: Robert Glasspoole
Reviews.Content: I received the Kindle Fire HDX on time and love everything about it.  The Wi-Fi works well and I can check "E" mail and Facebook as well as play games and read books,
Reviews.Title: Great product

Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "winnielss"
Reviews.Content: I can now carry more than one book when I go travel without putting too much weight in my suitcase. More importantly, I can read while my boyfriend is asleep right next to me without turning the light on. It was the best Xmas gift for me!
Reviews.Title: I absolutely love it!

Reviews.Author: Grace Roderick
Reviews.Content: I really enjoy my kindle but it will freeze from time to time. I would tell my friends about it.
Reviews.Title: kindle fire hdx

Reviews.Author: thomas a cappelloni
Reviews.Content: I AM NOT TECHNICALLY SAVVY.  I WOULD HAVE NEVER PURCHASED ANY DEVICE LIKE THIS.  IT WAS A GIFT FROM FRIENDS WHO ARE DETERMINED TO DRAG ME INTO THE 21ST CENTURY.  I EMBRACED IT.  I HAVE TRIED TO USE IT, AND HAVE ENJOYED THE THINGS I HAVE BEEN ABLE TO FIND.  THE BIGGEST PROBLEM FOR MYSELF AND MANY LIKE ME WHO CAME THROUGH COLLEGE AND GRADUATE SCHOOL WHEN COMPUTERS WERE HOUSED IN AIR CONDITIONED ROOMS, AND DATA WAS ENTERED ON PUNCH CARDS ---IS--- THERE IS NO USEFUL WAY TO FIND OUT HOW TO USE THE NUMEROUS FACITS OF THIS DEVICE.  THE TUTORIALS ARE VIRTUALLY USELESS.  SO THE DEVICE IS OF LIMITED VALUE TO ME.  I NEED AN INSTRUCTION APP THAT STARTS WITH A PICTURE THAT SHOWS YOU HOW TO TURN IT ON, AND DOES EVERY FUNCTION FROM THAT POINT.  YOUR INSTRUCTIONS ARE GEARED TO PEOPLE WHO HAVE COME UP WITH THIS TECHNOLOGY FROM KINDERGARTEN.  AND SO YOU LOSE AN ENTIRE MARKET BASE AMONG THE 50-70 YEAR OLD PEOPLE WHO WOULD LIKE TO USE A KINDLE, BUT DON'T HAVE GRANDCHILDREN OR GRADE- SCHOOLERS TO GIVE THEM TUTORIALS.
Reviews.Title: INSTRUCTIONAL FLAW

Reviews.Author: XJCraver
Reviews.Content: Nice little tablet. Handy for checking emails, forums, and such, and very easy to use.  BUT.....Amazon and Google have GOT to get their heads together, and come up with a way for me (and others) to access the Android apps I've ALREADY PAID FOR in the Play store.  It's ridiculous the amount of functionality you lose not being able to access those apps.  If I could link this thing to my Verizon phone, and have all my Play store apps on this thing, it would've got 4 1/2 stars instead of 3.  Very disappointed that I have to hack this thing to be able to use it to it's potential.  And before you go all "read about it before you buy it" on me - I received this as a gift.  I had no choice in the matter...The other 1/2 star it's lacking is an easy fix, and it flat boggles my mind that Amazon didn't include it in the programming  -  NO HAPTIC FEEDBACK OPTIONS?????????  That's basic, kindergarten-level stuff some programmer left out, and it's beyond annoying.  Really would make this thing much more user-friendly if these buttons gave me some feedback when I touched them.So overall,  3 stars.  I'd be fine with recommending it as a purchase, just do your research first and make sure you can do without your Play Store apps.  And do NOT gift it to someone, unless they're on their knees begging.  There are similarly priced tablets out there that will much better suit the average Android user.
Reviews.Title: Almost there...

Reviews.Author: Tonda Jean Jones
Reviews.Content: This is an amazing tablet. The color is off the chart. It's easy to use and offers many apps. If you are a beginner or expert. I would recommend this Kindle to anyone looking at tablets. This was my best Christmas present ever.....
Reviews.Title: awesome

Reviews.Author: Courtney Champy
Reviews.Content: I like the brightness and quality of the display. The speed is pretty good and it is easy to navigate.A very big turn-off is the lack of customization, I like my own backgrounds and now when I am not at home reading I cannot look at my dog which is relaxing and makes reading more enjoyable. Unfortunately the next model may have this but an upgrade that enables this would be phenomenal, as it is an expensive purchase and I cannot investing in the newest version for one change.
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 7"

Reviews.Author: thomas
Reviews.Content: This is a good device for kids from 6 to maybe 11. Its fast and light and very compact. I wouldn't get it for someone who is techy or a teen. The app store is really bad. It also doesn't have a back camera so all you can do is take selfies
Reviews.Title: kindle

Reviews.Author: K. Baudoin
Reviews.Content: I upgraded from a Kindle Fire first generation to the Kindle Fire HDX and absolutely love it!  The speed and new functions are unbeatable.  Light weight and beautiful visual graphic displays!  I couldn't be happier with the upgrade!!  Love the mail integration, ability to categorize with your own creative names for categories.  Videos are of the highest quality, making viewing an absolute pleasure!  Great price too!  Who needs an iPad when a Kindle Fire HDX offers so much more?
Reviews.Title: FANTASTIC Little Tablet!!

Reviews.Author: Dad P
Reviews.Content: Really love this kindle, just kicking myself for not getting the 8.9" right now. Everything I want is on my kindle now, and it is so easy to take with you wherever you go. Beats lugging a laptop around.
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 7"

Reviews.Author: Marge Ford
Reviews.Content: I got this for Christmas and I absolutely love it!  It is super fast. Set up for a breeze.  music video,games and movies play very well on it.  One of my sons checked it out after I got it and now he is going to get one.  I highly recommend this Kindle!!
Reviews.Title: fantastic!

Reviews.Author: E2 Cribbs
Reviews.Content: I love my kindle fire HDX it is the most amazing thing EVER you can download apps.and movies and books and the books are easy to read (its not blurry or anything) I know.I love it and I have never had any problems with the tablet and when I am bored all I have a to do is go on my kindle fire HDX I hope u found this review helpful:):):):)
Reviews.Title: AWESOME LOVE IT GET IT!!!!!!

Reviews.Author: Leigh 88
Reviews.Content: Sleek, Crystal clear..Amazing! I would recommend the HDX Kindle. Good for reading books or playing games. Definitely worth every penny
Reviews.Title: Love it!

Reviews.Author: Karen Lester
Reviews.Content: I have the Kindle Fire and love it!! So my husband got me the HDX for Christmas and WOW!!! So much better, better than an Ipad....the only thing is, I would like if there was a light to let you know if it's fully charged, I miss that on it!
Reviews.Title: Much better!

Reviews.Author: nicholas
Reviews.Content: Love it!! first tablet easy to use easy to download apps n has a great section to pick from from kids games to business apps
Reviews.Title: Great all around tablet

Reviews.Author: Betty J Wood
Reviews.Content: Love , Love, Love it.  Light and easy to hold and read. It totally met my expectations a must have.
Reviews.Title: Best Kindle

Reviews.Author: d
Reviews.Content: I bought two. One had the difficulty mentioned in other reviews - turning off often. MY husband contacted Amazon & they talked him through a fix. No more problems!
Reviews.Title: love it

Reviews.Author: Shawn M. Miller
Reviews.Content: I have the Kindle HDX, HD and Paperwhite.  They are all awesome.  If I could only buy one, I would buy the HDX, for the reason of versatility and the price difference between the HD and HDX with 16GB is only $60.  For $60, you get a faster processor, faster downloads, better screen and other enhancements.  If you are only going to use it for reading novels, then the Paperwhite is the way to go.  Very easy to use - if you use Amazon Prime this is the way to go.  If you don't, then only the Google Nexus and ipad compare with this device; I would look at those two before deciding to purchase.
Reviews.Title: Kindle HDX delivers

Reviews.Author: Just W
Reviews.Content: Second best packaging behind the Google Chromecast.The changes in the HDX vs the HD are very practical. From button placement to OS layout.Kindle's major flaw is software. Obviously Amazon & Google are competing in the device market. But as a Kindle owner, you lose out on access to Google apps. This is huge. The Kindle apps tend to be two or three versions behind their Google Play counterparts. The selection in the Amazon App Store is also much slimmer. Not getting some key apps from Google, Microsoft and other major developers. So if you are a power user, you might want to go with any other Android device.The screen resolution is really nice. Sharp and bright graphics. I've noticed an occasional brightness flicker. But nothing too terrible. Video playback is quick and clean. Easy to watch a whole movie on this.Really great speakers. Too bad there was no space for them on the front. The way that tablets are designed, no manufacturer really want's to take away screen space for speakers.Three things I want to see in the next version are:A return of the micro HDMI port. Who knows. I might use it one day.Upgrade-able memory.Replaceable battery.

Reviews.Author: Diana  Melissa
Reviews.Content: Very happy!!!! It was a Christmas presents for my kids and they love it I recommend not only for the games now they are reading more books
Reviews.Title: my kids loved it...

Reviews.Author: Douglas Dickerson "codougd"
Reviews.Content: ... for the annoying carousel and the fact that there is no way to disable it.Overall, the Kindle HDX is exactly as I expected and fits my needs, as planned and anticipated.The Kindle is NOT a "general purpose" tablet replacement or competitor. Its strengths are aimed squarely at us members of the Amazon ecosystem.It is a very good ereader. The color screen is crisp and, as a color screen, is more suitable for technical volumes than the B&W; Kindles. The is some glare in bright light but that is the trade-off for color.The included apps are good enough. I appreciate being able to jump to a browser to research something I encounter in book I am reading. The Silk browser is much improved over previous instances. The mail app is also good enough for casual use.I don't watch videos on the Kindle so I can't comment on the performance at that task. I have watched some video tutorials using the browser and that worked well.In all, if you accept that the Kindle is a media consumption device with hooks into and dependencies upon the Amazon ecosystem and if that is why you bought it you will be very happy. If you buy it as a cheaper alternative to other Android-based tablets you will likely be disappointed.
Reviews.Title: It would have been 5 stars except...

Reviews.Author: Lucy Cardona, Ph.D., LCSW
Reviews.Content: I was very ambivalent about returning the new Kindle Fire HDX 7" which I ordered one week ago.  This is because the HDX 7 has a great high definition display, is easy to use, and seemed to have better connectivity to the internet than did my old Kindle Fire. Today, I was at Starbucks, where I tried connecting to the internet through their free WIFI service, but failed to connect. I had not tried connecting in other environments other than in my home where I have high sped internet through a cable company. Thus, I ran into the very same connectivity issues that I had with my old Kindle. This was very disappointing as I had been reassured by the Amazon chat tech that the connectivity problems had been significantly improved (in the HDX 7'). For this reason, I made the decision not to order the 4G internet (Verizon) with it and ordered solely the WIFI connection for it. I am returning the device in the morning. I will explore other Kindle Fire products and likely order a more expensive model but this time, include the 4G (Verizon) with it.
Reviews.Title: WIFI Connectivity

Reviews.Author: Robert Hurst
Reviews.Content: I am so glad I finally bought a Kindle HDX.  Not disappointed one bit as it met all my expectations.
Reviews.Title: Very happy with my Kindle

Reviews.Author: A. Hughes
Reviews.Content: This is the third Kindle Fire HDX I purchased in 2 weeks. Had to buy one for myself after seeing how nice it was. I purchased one for my husband and also one for my son for Christmas. I replaced my old school Kindle which I loved! This one does so many more things and I especially love the wifi and HDX. Buy one today, you won't be disappointed!
Reviews.Title: Fabulous Kindle Fire

Reviews.Author: RNedNelson
Reviews.Content: I previously owned on of the very first Kindles but it was stolen and in disgust bought the cheap one with ads. For Christmas I got the 7" HDX Fire and it is wonderful! Way better for me than the 7" iPad I bought my wife for Christmas. I especially like the 'mayday' button vs. going into the Apple store to ask questions.
Reviews.Title: Kindle 7" HDX Fire is terrific!

Reviews.Author: Charles Gidman
Reviews.Content: I am enjoying my Kindle Fire. I like reading and the ability to have instant access to so many titles. I haven't really used it to it's full potential, just books and a couple simple games. Still getting used to it. But so far it's working out very well
Reviews.Title: Very Nifty

Reviews.Author: june  heefner
Reviews.Content: This was a gift to my sister which is 62 she cant stop thinking me so id say its a nice kindle.
Reviews.Title: this was a gift

Reviews.Author: S. Simons "MOM of  SGT TR"
Reviews.Content: After having a 'regular' kindle for 3 years, I decided to update (as a gift for myself) to a Fire HDX...WOW! ...such vivid pictures, and the ability to increase the print size with a touch of my finger is amazing!  I had over 400 books on my original, and they are there (in the cloud) or I can move them back and forth. I love having my Bible on my Fire, as well as several of my favorite cookbooks. I have even downloaded Craftsy classes and view those seamlessly as I sew right along! LOVE, LOVE, LOVE my new Kindle!!
Reviews.Title: How did I live without it?

Reviews.Author: David Cripe
Reviews.Content: I bought this Kindle Fire HDX during the cyber-Monday special of $179, which was totally worth it as that price.  My family has owned the original Kindle Fire the past two years roughly, and this one is way above that version.  Is it better than the Kindle Fire HD version?  Depends, but probably not if price is your biggest factor.Pros:1) iPad Contender - Seriously.  The iPad in my opinion is way overpriced for what it does.  The Kindle Fire HDX is just as capable at handling most of the same work flow with a couple of differences.  Yes, this is tied to the Amazon App store.  If Google Play was standard, then Apple might be worried.  Right now though, Amazon is crippling their own success.2) Fluid Performance - Smooth as butter.  I have played around with everything available for the past two months and it handles it all with excellence.  Games, work, reading, etc run flawlessly (app issues not withstanding).3) Screen - Sharpest resolution I have ever seen on a screen this size.  Made the original Kindle Fire look like a 10 year old non-HD television.  I could stare at this thing for days (but won't).  Reading, movies, games, etc are shown in perfect HD resolution.NOTE - The blue pixel edge issue is there, but it is not distracting to me.  I actually kind of like it.  If you read a lot on white backgrounds, then it pops out more than normal.  The haze falls to the background after I begin reading the first page of something, and I never notice it much any more.4) Micro USB Connector - Bite it Apple!  :)  No cord carousal here.  If you have a cord sitting around, it most likely works for charging or connecting the Kindle Fire HDX.  For the first time ever - a plug adapter is included!  Amazon is including a plug adapter so you can actually charge the device through a regular electrical outlet.  What a concept Amazon!  That might catch on with other electronics (sarcasm).5) Bells and Whistles - This thing has it all (mostly).  Dual-band WiFi, HD screen, Amazon support (best in the world), light as a feather, etc, etc.Cons:1) Amazon App Store (sort of) - No Google Play?  I know Amazon wants everyone to use the device for their content, but not allowing one of the largest app stores on your Android device seems illogical.  I am able to use 3rd-party app stores to upload missing apps and outdated ones on the Amazon App Store, but still!2) USB Connection Port - The connection port on the device can be a bit of a nuisance.  You have to connect it at an angle on the device (around 30 degrees).  Just irritating to me for some reason as everything else has it straight, so your mileage may vary.3) Mayday Button Gimmick - I am a computer-savvy person.  I don't need help on where to press the power button or tweak the brightness.  If you are buying this for grandma or a person that never has used much technology in the past 10 years, then this is a life saver for you (no more annoying phone calls).4) Battery - I get a couple days of heavy usage (8 hours) out of it.  I just wish I could get the Kindle reader battery life of 4 to 8 weeks.  :)Overall:This is finally the Kindle to put Amazon in striking range of Apple on the tablet front.  If you crave everything Amazon like me, then it is a no brainer to purchase this.  If you are not, then buy it anyway as you will save at least $100 over the nearest priced iPad.  If Amazon would just switch to Google Play for the app store, then there is nothing that would stop them from ruling the world!  :)
Reviews.Title: Best Kindle Fire Hands Down

Reviews.Author: Melissa
Reviews.Content: New owned a Kindle or a Tablet and got this for Christmas and I love it! It's like a mini laptop to go! I highly recommend this to everyone, it's very user friendly and stays charged for quite a while.  And the possibilities are endless!! LOVE, LOVE, LOVE IT!!!!
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 7"

Reviews.Author: Christine Smith
Reviews.Content: I got this one for me. It is light and the HD is pretty awesome. The colors are fantastic and life-like. I can actually listen to my books or music and I think the sound is good. The woman who "reads" to you doesn't have some weird voice, but you know it is mechanical. It is not annoying. Music sounds really good even playing it without headphones. I use it for almost everything: email, browsing, games. The games are bright and responsive. I have not used MayDay as I am figuring things out.  The battery is more than satisfactory and I have found it to last most of the day and part of the night. Email gives me some trouble and I learned quickly to check it before hitting send. You wouldn't believe what I sent to someone. It is a good candidate for "Damn you autocorrect". We had a good laugh about it, though. At any rate, I recommend the HDX. I just couldn't wait for the larger one, but I find the 7 inch is just fine. Thanks Amazon. People have complained you have to use so much Amazon items. I mostly use it as I am also a Prime member, so this is a no brainer for me.
Reviews.Title: I love this Kindle HDX

Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer "osetleo"
Reviews.Content: I just bought Kindle Fire HDX which became the second Kindle Fire in our family. My wife was using the original Kindle Fire for 2 years and I was thinking to give her a new one and use the original for myself. We mostly use Kindle fire for reading books with occasional use for movies and other applications.When we loaded books to the new Kindle Fire HDX my wife noticed that in the book view it has very visible thin line of glare approximately 1/8" around the perimeter of the screen that is different in color than the rest of the text. Comparing with the original Kindle Fire it looks quite annoying when you read books.All other features and capabilities of the new HDX look very impressive.If you have a Kindle HDX 7 could you please let me know if this is something you experience as well or it is the specifics of the unit I got?Really appreciate your reply
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 7" -glare around the perimeter of the screen in book mode

Reviews.Author: mark heffernan
Reviews.Content: Above what we expected , Xmas gift for grand kid also cannot keep her off it, kids time was also a great purchase
Reviews.Title: Great

Reviews.Author: William Perdue
Reviews.Content: Very good item - Only negative is the inability to expand memory by adding a larger SD chip or something similar.
Reviews.Title: Very good item

Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I haven't had it a month yet but so far I like it I wanted to replace my IPad 2 mostly because of the size for taking with me in my purse much smaller and lighter,only complaint so far is it's missing a few apps I need  for workso I can leave the IPad.I'm hopeful that they will add them soon.
Reviews.Title: I like it

Reviews.Author: Laura
Reviews.Content: I am still in the learning phase.  If I could make one suggestion, that would be that there should be a quick set-up help booklet/pamphlet for seniors to use.
Reviews.Title: Suggestion

Reviews.Author: kendra wheeler
Reviews.Content: Love it. .... No complaints!! Easy to use even for someone older and not familiar with computers tablets etc. Small but packs big power in use!
Reviews.Title: Love it!

Reviews.Author: Beverly Kimbrough
Reviews.Content: Very pleased with the Kindle HDX. This is my third kindle, and I have been pleased with all of them. Amazon really delivers on their products!!
Reviews.Title: Love my kindle HDX

Reviews.Author: Wallace H Ford Jr
Reviews.Content: Really great.  I upgraded from the Kindle Fire First Edition.  Am glad I did.  Watching movies is wonderful on this device.
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 7"

Reviews.Author: S. HUTCHINS
Reviews.Content: Bought for my son and son in laws. They liked it very much. Shipping was very fast. Thank you for a good experience.
Reviews.Title: Loved it

Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: Love the enhanced graphics and lighter weight.  I was, however, disappointed when I realized the camera only takes photos to the front.  I thought it only faced forward, not toward the viewer.  Very awkward to take normal photos.
Reviews.Title: pleased with Kindle, but not with camera.

Reviews.Author: Barbara VW
Reviews.Content: This Kindle Fire is easy to hold and has a pull down menu on with options that could be the most used (wireless, screen rotation, settings). The ads are really not too intrusive. Turn on the Kindle and you have a full screen ad which disappears when you swipe the unlock icon and ads on the bottom of the screen when reading. Has beautiful color. E-reader portion works well. Games are a joy compared to my Nook Color. It eats up energy playing games and when Wi-Fi is on. On the web this Kindle causes a problem with entering e-mail names and passwords since the area to touch is small and very close together.  Need to remember the book you were reading because when you go to something else (games, web) the book does not reappear like the Keep Reading icon on the Nook Color works. I have been using the trial and error method to find out how things work so there may be better ways to do some  things.
Reviews.Title: love Kindle Fire HDX 7 (have had 1 month)

Reviews.Author: Janie Sirmans
Reviews.Content: After reading some questionable reviews, I was a little apprehensive about this purchase. This was a gift for my husband, and I was afraid I had made a big mistake. However, he loves this tablet. He has nothing negative to say - no adds- no nothing. It is fast and the graphics are incredible.
Reviews.Title: Awesome tablet

Reviews.Author: Bobb's
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle Fire HDX. Its small, light and the screen is amazing. I am vested in Amazon's services like MP3 and Instant video which make it perfect for me as buying and consuming content is so easy on this tablet.The new Fire OS is much better than last year, easier to use and much faster all in all a great tablet and I would recommend people consider this over other Android Tablets or the iPad.
Reviews.Title: Awesome tablet, no longer use my iPad Mini

Reviews.Author: Patty L. Brady
Reviews.Content: Enjoying this way more than just the KINDLE !! I do everything on it. I watch movies,tv,videos,I even listen to my music. I received it as a CHRISTMAS present and I am legally blind. I am able to blow up and see the screen a lot better than the KINDLE fire. The HD is awesome ....thanks to some special features I practically live on this.
Reviews.Title: loving this over the plain KINDLE

Reviews.Author: Kathy Manson
Reviews.Content: I did a lot of research and this was my choice and with the price who can resist.  I am a photographer and do a lot of traveling and chose this so i could just take this rather then laptop on trips.  I can upload my photos from here to my external hard drive.  I have also found i am reading a lot more just having this so easily accessible.
Reviews.Title: Merry Christmas to me

Reviews.Author: Ducks
Reviews.Content: Like the Kindle Fire HDX 7, being a tablet it has given me hours of enjoyment.I do find reading or viewing the tablet in bright sunshine is difficult.When reading a book, I do notice some screen flicker after turning every page.Would buy again and the price is right.
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 7

Reviews.Author: A. Andrews "amelia0722"
Reviews.Content: I ordered this for myself for XMAS. Of course I opened it EARLY......like mid november......I priced the IPADS and the KINDLES and THE NOOKS ....and THE GALAXIES.......I wanted a new tablet........I love apple products....Have a MAC, an IPHONE and IPOD and a GEN 1 IPAD..........the KINDLE I chose for price and picture quality. I do alot of games and netflix and music. So far it has been what I need for my leisurely time on the couch or before I go to bed. AND i love love love it in the kitchen for my recipes !!!! AMAZON support is amazing and I am glad I took a chance on it. VERY USER friendly, light weight and perfect size to hold with one hand.
Reviews.Title: It was a KINDLE or a MINI IPAD , im glad I chose the KINDLE

Reviews.Author: taa9804
Reviews.Content: I am not a book reader, I am not sure if I like the Kindle yet, but I do recommend it, it seems to be a great product!!! The only thing I don't like is that with the camera, you can't take a picture unless you take it of yourself, or turn the whole device around to take it of something else...strange camera setup! Overall I like this product and would recommend it, especially to readers!
Reviews.Title: Great!!

Reviews.Author: Brittany Clifford
Reviews.Content: I purchased the Kindle FIre HDX 7 on black Friday and got a great deal.Pros:Great for readingEasy to useMayday feature is really awesome.Great size for traveling and reading in bedCons:I'm not sure if this is user error  - but I've tried many times to turn off the predict text and it just wont turn off. I even used the mayday button and the text support couldn't help.I gave up on using a lot of the social media apps on this... the quality isn't the best.
Reviews.Title: I like it

Reviews.Author: Sarah E. "music Lover"
Reviews.Content: This is what I call my Kindle, not to be sarcastic, but to show that you don't have to spend a lot of money to have a good product. I love my kindle!!
Reviews.Title: My Poormans IPad

Reviews.Author: jesse
Reviews.Content: WHAT A NEAT GIFT! MY KIDS LOVE IT! Picture quality is exquisite! get yourself one today and change your life forever!
Reviews.Title: NEAT

Reviews.Author: Gail
Reviews.Content: I love the fact that it is small and yet I can still go online. I love the HELP in person, that is very nice. I don't know all of the ins and outs of this yet, but it is very useful, and will be I feel
Reviews.Title: Loving this HDX 7"

Reviews.Author: Michael Kopiec
Reviews.Content: I have been a Mac person since 1984 and still love Apple, but what sold me on the kindle was the mayday feature. The picture is as good as my 13 inch retina display Macbook Pro, and the mayday thing really works. Really.
Reviews.Title: Great tablet

Reviews.Author: Luvlunarya
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle. The main reason I purchased it was for my books and magazines. My daughter likes watching her shows too!!
Reviews.Title: Good buy

Reviews.Author: Lauralee227
Reviews.Content: Performs better than expected.  A great gift.  Far exceeds my previous tablet.  Highly recommend to anyone looking to buy a tablet.
Reviews.Title: Great Product

Reviews.Author: marge mildner
Reviews.Content: Started out mid 2013 wanting a new phone and/or new computer.  Both are operating fine but older models. Had the opportunity to play with an I-pad.  Initialy taken by the device but eventually knew that I didn't want that particular device.  After seeing the size and capabilities of the Kindle Fire HD X ,I decided to take a chance.  It has more than made me excited about my choice.  Biggest reason is the size. I-pad was too big in size for me.  Thhis Kindle is just the right size for carrying around and still having access to my computer,books,newspapers and eventually I think I'll add Skype, since all but one of my children live 2 to 6 hours away.  Made my phone and computer both better to live with without having to upgrade.  Now I have the best of all worlds.
Reviews.Title: Learning new skills all the time.

Reviews.Author: denise reeves
Reviews.Content: It not only allows me to read my books, but I've also learned how to play my games and watch my shows as well! My family is grateful for kindle e-books, the amount of space saved could now be used for other things.
Reviews.Title: My new best friend!

Reviews.Author: Mary Byrum
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my son who only wanted this Kindle for Christmas. His eyes lit up and he was off to his room to enjoy it. I haven't used it, yet my son says it is everything he had hoped for and more. It is easy to use, clear display and the sound is powerful compared to other units he tried out. We got the unit with the advertisements. The advertisements in no way interferes with his use of this Kindle. In fact, he says he likes the advertisements to learn of what is new and available. The advertisements only show up upon turning the unit on then go away. I researched for some time as to which one to get for my son. I'm glad I chose this one.  I would recommend it to others without hesitation.
Reviews.Title: Christmas wish came true!

Reviews.Author: Handgun Hunter
Reviews.Content: Worth every penny.  Better interface, graphics, and battery life than my previous 2 kindles.  It is worth the money purchasing the version without the ads - those things get annoying after a while.
Reviews.Title: Best Kindle yet!

Reviews.Author: momtosix
Reviews.Content: This is an upgrade for me from my kindle fire.  I love that it is smaller.  It is a big bonus that I can take a photo and upload to facebook right now.  16GB is more than I had before.I still love my old kindle and never ran out of memory.Highly recommend this easy to travel kindle. Wherever their is WI-FI I can connect.
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX  is a nice investment in social media

Reviews.Author: D. Tobias "davtej"
Reviews.Content: I got the fire hdx 7 a few days ago and so far I love it and am looking forward to discovering new things about it.  Slight problem I had, the fire hdx wouldn't play my favorites you tube videos but my ipad air had no problem playing them.  anyone know why this would happen. Both Kindle and Ipad say they have incredible processors and other items to make outstanding systems.  I thought they would be on par.
Reviews.Title: new to amazon

Reviews.Author: j. king
Reviews.Content: I love the graphics and the speed of the new Kindle Fire HDX 7 inch tablet.  My kids jumped up and down when they each received this as a Christmas present.  They were glued to the device exploring all of the features including the amazing selection of apps and books available through the kindle store.  My kids being of school aged can easily use this convenient portable device for school research as well as downloading books from the kindle store at a more affordable price.  My daughter surprised me when she mentioned that the teachers were recommending the kindle fire to students.I especially like the May-Day button where you can instantaneously get live assistance to any question concerning the device.  At first this feature freaked my daughter but after getting help to rotate her screen, she quickly fell in love with this feature that is only available on the Kindle Fire HDX.  I also love that I can share my already kindle purchased books with them. I highly recommend to all.
Reviews.Title: Amazing graphics on the Kindle Fire HDX

Reviews.Author: Princess "The Exceptional Lady"
Reviews.Content: Love love love it!!! This is my third kindle purchase. And I'm about to get a fourth for a gift for my mom
Reviews.Title: highly recommended

Reviews.Author: mollysgirl
Reviews.Content: I love the fact that my new kindle is so compact.  I can carry it in my purse and it works great at the gym.  the cover I bought for it is awesome and the clear protection sheets are really nice.
Reviews.Title: compact

Reviews.Author: Steven Distler
Reviews.Content: I love the kindle fire HDX. The quality of the screen is Crystal clear. The only thing is I got the 16gb but when I check my memory it only sass says about 11gb. I would like to know what happened to the rest of my space
Reviews.Title: awesome

Reviews.Author: P. K. Grogger "Fantasy Wizard"
Reviews.Content: Everything that was stated about the Kindle Fire HDX 7 is true! The clarity of the screen and the contrast and brightness of films and websites is excellent. The Internet is easily used. I just wish I had spent the money on the 8.9 version when watching films. I have not used the camera but will update this review when I have done so.
Reviews.Title: The price is everything when deciding to by a Kindle Fire HDX; 7 or 8.9

Reviews.Author: martin
Reviews.Content: I bought the kindle for my boy for Christmas, and we all love it, picture quality is great compared to the iPad, price is good to, bought it on cyber Monday
Reviews.Title: Hdx

Reviews.Author: co
Reviews.Content: My daughter loves her new Kindle. I am so glad we bought it for her. The color is amazing and the sound is great. She has so much more storage space. I give it 5 stars for sure.
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire hdx is great

Reviews.Author: Justin B.
Reviews.Content: It isn't as fluent and seamless as the newer Ipads but for the cost you cant beat it. I can see Kindle being very competitive as far as functionality in the next model or two. If they can do this and keep the cost down, the market is theirs.
Reviews.Title: Great buy for the value

Reviews.Author: MRL
Reviews.Content: Very good device otherwise,but unfortunately they don't tell you that 16 g (really 12gig due to internal system requirements) is not enough to download a movie in hd. Otherwise a v good device for a commuter who likes to watch a movie while traveling to and fro work each day,display is exceptional.
Reviews.Title: 16g not enough to download hd movies!

Reviews.Author: N. McCloskey "NJ MOM"
Reviews.Content: I replaced my old back and white kindle with the Kindle Fire HDX.  It is lightning fast and has a beautiful display.  I even used the Mayday button twice and the reps were so helpful and kind.  (no, they can't see you :)What a great purchase.
Reviews.Title: FANTASTIC!

Reviews.Author: Michael Hulick
Reviews.Content: This is better than the iPad mini. It's far cheaper and has all the features the iPad mini has.  The screen resolution is sharper than the iPad mini. I like the Kindle Fire HDX.
Reviews.Title: Better than the iPad mini

Reviews.Author: Wanda Holmes
Reviews.Content: So, glad that i purchase this gift for my grand daughter ! She and myself are very well entertain . Weill be purchasing prime in the near future.
Reviews.Title: Awesome

Reviews.Author: T. M. Massengill "navy_wife19"
Reviews.Content: I've had a basic Kindle for a couple of years now, and I really enjoyed it.  I only used it to read books, so it met my needs wonderfully.  This Christmas I got a new Kindle Fire HDX from 'Santa'.  I love being able to do all of the other things that a tablet can do.  However, my basic Kindle had a feature that my new one does not:  the ability to group books into 'collections'.  I mostly read books that come from series.  Call me crazy, but I get invested in characters.  I have several different series that I enjoy, so it frustrates me that I cannot group books in the same series to one collection.  I can have them listed by author, but I have two different series written by the same author.  After that it's alphabetical.  On my basic Kindle, I was able to put them in order.
Reviews.Title: Missing Feature

Reviews.Author: Gran Ann
Reviews.Content: I received my Kindle Fire 4 days ago and have had nothing but problems with utilizing the audio function for book reading.  I'm not talking about purchasing an audio book.  This is the "play to listen" function on books I have purchased from Amazon which I like to listen to at night or on trips.  The audio function will work for a few pages and stop on 1 title, or on another title stop at the beginning of each chapter, etc..  After several hours with 6 different people at "Amazon assist" , I now have been told a work ticket has been sent to developers about the issue and I will probably hear something from someone within 5 days.  The 6 people have all been extremely nice, courteous and completely baffled with this problem.  I love the Amazon assist button.There has been an inference that perhaps it is a fault of the publishers causing the problem.  My older Kindle, however, plays the same books without any glitches.  Since on a normal day the reading function will be used more than any other I will be returning the product if a fix is not discovered or a replacement is not offered that will provide the service I have come to expect from Amazon.  Wow, this is the biggest disappointment so far in 2014!!  I had so looked forward to this gift I gave myself!
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX Problem

Reviews.Author: Paula Marshall
Reviews.Content: I was skeptical about purchasing this item but once i got it I began to appreciate all of the different things one can do with this tablet but most of all i love the online help screen.
Reviews.Title: kindle fire

Reviews.Author: Donald T
Reviews.Content: If you are an Amazon Prime member this is a no nonsense purchase. Most apps are free. This tablet won't break your budget and is one of the best purchases for the money that I have ever made. Sound and display are great.
Reviews.Title: Amazing Tablet!

Reviews.Author: Carol
Reviews.Content: I am not a "techie" and this was easy to start and navigate for this beginner.I had no trouble shopping and down loading or changing settings.
Reviews.Title: Love it!

Reviews.Author: Shiloh S.
Reviews.Content: We bought this for my son for Christmas. It was easily his favorite Christmas present. It's easy to operate, the images are amazing, it takes great pictures... I think it's pretty handy that I can review apps from my pc and send them to the kindle.
Reviews.Title: My 5yo loves it!

Reviews.Author: mbd
Reviews.Content: for the money, i am not sure you can find a better device.  i like the smaller (7") form factor, as it is just a lot easier for me to use.  the picture is fantastic, and the text for reading is unbelievably clear.  movies are also great, and i am glad they finally have added bluetooth so that i can play it to my wireless headphones.i do miss a rear facing camera, and a number of apps that work on the older fire don't seem to work very well (some audio problems)
Reviews.Title: excellent

Reviews.Author: JWoods "Judi"
Reviews.Content: This purchase was an upgrade for me from the Kindle Fire.  I am still getting acquainted with the features, but I would definitely recommend it to my friends and family.  The pictures are sharp and brilliant, especially when streaming a movie.  When I stream music from Pandora, I use an external speaker which makes it easier to adjust the sound.
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 7"

Reviews.Author: Ruby J. DeForest
Reviews.Content: I am pleasantly surprised by the capabilities of this tablet.  It has a great picture and sound quality for watching video.As a reader it has some very nice features such as combining audio books with Kindle books.Browsing the web it fast and easy.It's was easy to set up my eMail account connection.
Reviews.Title: Great Buy!!!

Reviews.Author: Vandermin
Reviews.Content: It did not taste the way i thought it would very crunchy and cut my mouth. I need four more words O nope now im done
Reviews.Title: it ok i guess

Reviews.Author: JMG
Reviews.Content: So easy to use, access apps, get books from purchase or library loan.  I Was an iPad user prior. Prefer comfort of this weight and size. Not as many apps but the selections are not bad and figure given time more will be added. This unit will pay for itself by renting college textbooks from Amazon compared to buying hard book on campus plus loads lighter in backpack.
Reviews.Title: love the move to kindle

Reviews.Author: Douglas McDermott
Reviews.Content: My step mother is over the moon with it. The Kindle HDX Has everything she wanted in a tablet. The price was on point, she loves it, can't beat that. Thank you!
Reviews.Title: Kindle HDX was a great gift to give.

Reviews.Author: Catherine Darsey
Reviews.Content: I've been wanting a kindle for some time and my husband got me this one for Christmas. It does everything my cell phone does except make phone calls.
Reviews.Title: Love, love, love

Reviews.Author: Gi Man Kim
Reviews.Content: First off, I've owned iPad II and currently own Nexus 7 (2nd gen).  I used my tablets for mostly playing music, reading digital books, watching videos (youtube, etc...), social media and surfing the web with little bit of business use mixed in for my work.I got the kindle fire HDX for my wife.  She recently discovered how great the Kindle books are so she's been hogging my Nexus to read.  So I figured, I'll get her the Kindle since it was on sale for X-mas.She loves her Kindle.  It's very simple and easy to use and thing is very responsive and fast!  Might be faster than my Nexus 7.  It's very user-friendly and she was off and going in no time even though she's not very techonology savvy.It is great for consumption of media (mainly Amazon media) and the Silk browser is quick and easy to use.  So if your looking for a tablet that you are going to use to play media from Amazon and to surf the web and play games.  Don't look any further.  If you are looking for a tablet that is more open and can be used for enterprising and business, look elsewhere.
Reviews.Title: Exceeded my expectations

Reviews.Author: Thomas L Guffey
Reviews.Content: Awesome, Awesome, Awesome. Love everything about it. Good battery life, good looking device, and the 7 inch is much easier to handle then the 8.9 .
Reviews.Title: Awesomeness

Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: The kindle HDX is faster than the HDX color and the graphics is fantastic I have. 32 kbps of memory
Reviews.Title: was a Christmas gift from my loving husband

Reviews.Author: ANIL RAMKISSOON
Reviews.Content: This is one of the best tablets for anybody age. I use for work and play games in my FreeTime at home. The pictures and sound is a big improvement of the first kindle fire. You will not regret buy this.
Reviews.Title: One of the best tablets

Reviews.Author: Donna Faus
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love my new Kindle Fire HDX 7". It completely exceeds my expectations! I would recommend it to anyone.
Reviews.Title: I LOVE IT!!!

Reviews.Author: T. J. Jones "ImaginaryFlowersUSA"
Reviews.Content: I update to the latest Kindle every year.  The HDX 7" is great with Wi-Fi.  I like the 64 GB and quad core processor.  The dual band wi-fi can use more power than my Internet can really deliver.  I will probably have to update my whole Internet package.  When I use the wi-fi to do downloads, everything on my wi-fi slows to a crawl and my Internet movies on Amazon and home computer freeze till it is done.  I think my phone company only offers 100 Mbps with my current package. This kindle is powerful and takes over my whole Wi-Fi service.The power adapter is a little different this year and goes in at an angle (thought it didn't fit).  The adapter comes with the Kindle.I will be keeping my old Kindle Fire HD, because I still enjoy it and some of the old apps I am not tired of yet (not compatible to HDX).  I will be able to upload more of my pdf's to this newer Kindle, because pdf's use a lot more space. Also I can download more TV shows and movies, since I live in the Amazon ecosystem.I like the clock on the screen is back. When I open the Kindle cover, the clock is in the corner with the date.  That was not on the HD, but was on the first Fire (it was bigger).I like the offers, because it is important to me what else is available.  The screen is beautiful as always. I did have to make some adjustments to brightness (using settings) and the books (using view) I am reading. Actually for us older folks, brighter is better.The sound is nice. I was watching PBS channel out in my yard and my neighbors could hear it. The PBS channel app  was not something I was aware of before, but loving it now (even with my Internet service).The HDX is smaller than the HD 7", but the screen is still the same size.The camera on the 7"HDX is better than the HD.  I really like it, because it comes with its own app, and I don't have to download a free app like last year. The one on my 7" HD has problems but was free.
Reviews.Title: so far so good

Reviews.Author: Theresa L. Lane "EnglishUnicorn"
Reviews.Content: We have a Google Chromecast and Iphones here. This works with our existing technology ecosystem. It recognized the Google Chromecast instantly. No issues with compatibility. Lots of aps. Excellent speed, streaming, OS runs faster than any Android or IOS I have seen. Very easy to use and great MAYDAY support on Christmas day. I did not and will not regret this purchase. We Chromecast Netflix off this as well as Pandora and several other apps. Sound on this thing is EPICLY AWESOME and LOUD. Amazon has officially won the tablet war. Ipad..it is time to lower your price to TRY to be competitive.
Reviews.Title: Buy this!

Reviews.Author: Eric Houser
Reviews.Content: Great to use with Amazon Prime.  Large amount of movies and TV shows to choose from for free.  Lending library is also cheap and convenient..
Reviews.Title: Easy to use, great with Amazon Prime

Reviews.Author: geoerl niles
Reviews.Content: Very clear, good connectivity. My wife really likes it! The apps are easy to find! And the movies are crystal clear
Reviews.Title: Great device

Reviews.Author: Diane D
Reviews.Content: This is my 4th Kindle. I started with the 2nd generation. It was ok, but hard to read outside. Then I bought the Kindle Fire. Much better. But it broke after a couple of years. I bought my husband a Paper white, which he loves. BUT this HDX is great !  The picture quality is excellent. My grandson loves the Free Time so he can play his games and read books. I used the Mayday feature and was very impressed with the service. I like it because it is lighter than the original Kindle Fire too. Easy to navigate and search for things. I would highly recommend this to anyone. I LOVE IT !!!!!!
Reviews.Title: Best Kindle yet

Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer "ReadFreak"
Reviews.Content: Yes I got it today, so no real issues. It's my third kindle my fire HD is being passed on to another family member. It's still going strong. The light bleed which I was worried about due to other reviews is insignificant to me and usually LED lights bother me. So I'm glad this worked out. Unless I look for it I don't notice it. The browser is much faster and I'm happy with the set up of buttons and such. The mayday button is nice too for when you really can't figure something out. Overall I'm looking forward to this becoming my new favorite device. I didn't give 5 stars as I've only had it for about 4 hours ;)
Reviews.Title: love it..

Reviews.Author: Kyle Beck
Reviews.Content: Okay so this device is outstanding.  I am coming from the original kindle fire and it was well worth the upgrade.  The screen is amazing, very sharp, definitely as good if not better than the retina dispalay.  The sound is also very good.  The new interface is great.  It is really fast and fluid.  My only complaints are the location of the volume and power buttons, as well as the camera.  They are positioned in A way vest suited for holding the device landscape, while I would personally prefer them to be positioned in more of a portrait manner.  Another plus to the device is the Appstore has grown a lot since the first kindle fire.  It has most of the games that iOS has.  The only thing it lacks is a a program like word, excell, and PowerPoint.  Over all I would definitely recommend this device to anyone who likes an amazing display, a very decent battery life, great sound, a good Appstore, and a light sleek device.
Reviews.Title: AMAZING

Reviews.Author: Linda
Reviews.Content: My laptop died, with no hope of repair, the day after I ordered this Kindle.  So far, I'm not missing it.  I do find a stylus makes me more comfortable than poking about the screen with my clumsy fingers.  I also have a Kindle keyboard, which remains my favorite for lounging and reading.  Comparing the Fire HDX and the Kindle keyboard is a bit like the old apples and oranges comparison, though.  It's really, in my mind, comparing an ereader to a tablet.This Kindle is great fun, particularly if you enjoy streaming media and wandering around online.  It's an amazing amount of technology in a tiny package.
Reviews.Title: Happy

Reviews.Author: Ben and Jess
Reviews.Content: My boyfriend and I got a Kindle together for christmas and we love it. Easy to use and the picture is amazing. :) thank you
Reviews.Title: So much fun

Reviews.Author: Shirley G
Reviews.Content: Love it! Had one of the first Kindles to come out, never left the house without it! I used it daily! I purchased this one after my sister gave it rave reviews! Have had it only a few days, still trying to discover all I can do with it. Have down loaded songs and books on it, I Love the color on it! Have watched a couple movies on it, love the picture and sound quality. I love that it is light weight. Am VERY satisfied with my purchase! I never leave the house with out it! Would definitely recommend it to anyone who loves to read, listen to music or watch movies. The price was affordable too! Can't say enough good things about it!!
Reviews.Title: Love it!!!!

Reviews.Author: L. Vanness "VERY HAPPY"
Reviews.Content: WELL needless to say my husband loves his new toy.  It is great he now has some place to read books and do email, so he is very happy, does not talk much to me but he is fine.
Reviews.Title: GOOD PURCHASE!!!!

Reviews.Author: J. Jones
Reviews.Content: The picture is absolutely amazing!  Only wish I would have got the 64gb instead of the 32.  The HD downloaded movies and shows are taking up alot of room.
Reviews.Title: Great Picture!

Reviews.Author: Tre
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my dad for Christmas and I've been playing with it and I must say I think they did a great job with this one. Especially if you aren't very tech savy this tablet is great.
Reviews.Title: Amazing for the money!

Reviews.Author: Joan McCormick
Reviews.Content: Only have had this a few days, but have grown attached to it :)  This is my first electronic device other than my sell phone and computer.  Love how easy it is to use and also very easy to read books on.  The picture quality is outstanding!  Only problem is now I get carried away relaxing with all the activities it offers and don't get my work done :)
Reviews.Title: Fun Device

Reviews.Author: Smcswiney
Reviews.Content: I never been a huge fan of tablets but I really like this product. My boyfriend got it for me as a early Christmas gift even though I didn't want it and now I take it everywhere with me.
Reviews.Title: Great Christmas gift

Reviews.Author: Trudy McGuire
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love it.  The picture is great, I have to fight the kids to get a chance to use it.  Its small enough to bring with me every where I go.  I even bought each of my kids one of their own so I can use mine!
Reviews.Title: This was a great purchase

Reviews.Author: Uhura
Reviews.Content: Very Handy, light weight and fits perfectly in my purse.  Sometimes myipad is too large,  the Kindle Fire HDX 7" is the perfect size.
Reviews.Title: Perfect

Reviews.Author: footloose 321
Reviews.Content: It was so hard making a decison on a tablet. I bought the color nook years ago and thought I didn't need to upgrade. I coulnd't decide between the ipad mini and the fire hdx.  I chose the later and I love it. It is so clear and crisp.  I like all the free stuff amazon offers with it.  Great buy.
Reviews.Title: Love my new tablet

Reviews.Author: cw4ret@msn.com
Reviews.Content: Clear, sharp, and fast.  Only weakness might be short battery life and long charging times compared to other Kindle readers.
Reviews.Title: I really like it.

Reviews.Author: Bruce Lawson
